K03pspdut2u:3: 00103 yā tvaṃ sarvān avadyāṅgi niravadyair nirīkṣyase//
K03pspdut2u:5: 00105 yas tvāṃ paśyati bhāvena sa paśyati tathāgatam//
K03pspdut2u:7: 00107 na paśyanty antaraṃ santaś candracandrikayor iva//
K03pspdut2u:10: 00110 sakṛd apy āśaye śuddhe yas tvāṃ vidhivad īkṣate/

K03pspdut2u:14: 00203 yad buddhā lokaguravaḥ putrās tava kṛpālavaḥ/
K03pspdut2u:21: 00210 tvāṃ prāpya pralayaṃ yānti doṣā vādāś ca vādinām//
K03pspdut2u:24: 00213 yasya tvayy apy abhiṣvaṅgas tvannāthasya na vidyate/
K03pspdut2u:26: 00215 nāgacchasi kutaś cittaṃ na ca kvacana gacchasi/
K03pspdut2u:27: 00216 sthāneṣv api ca sarveṣu vidvadbhir nopalabhyase//
K03pspdut2u:28: 00217 ye tvām evaṃ na paśyanti prapadyante ca bhāvataḥ/
K03pspdut2u:29: 00218 prapadya ca vimucyante tad idaṃ mahad adbhutam//
K03pspdut2u:30: 00301 tvām eva badhyate paśyann apaśyann api badhyate/
K03pspdut2u:31: 00302 tvām eva mucyate paśyann apaśyann api mucyate//
K03pspdut2u:33: 00304 sudurbodhāsi māyeva dṛśyase na ca dṛśyase//
K03pspdut2u:34: 00305 buddhaiḥ prayekabuddhaiś ca śrāvakaiś ca niṣevitā/
K03pspdut2u:35: 00306 mārgas tvam eko mokṣasya nāsty anya iti niścayaḥ//
K03pspdut2u:37: 00308 kṛpayā lokanāthais tvam ucyase ca na cocyase//
K03pspdut2u:38: 00309 śaktaḥ kas tvām iha stotuṃ nirnimittāṃ nirañjanām/

K03pspdut2u:41: 00312 tvām astutyām api stutvā tuṣṭūṣantaḥ sunirvṛtāaḥ/
K03pspdut2u:43: 00314 tenās tv āśu jagat kṛtsnaṃ prajñāpāraparāyaṇam//

K03pspdut2u:110: 00707 atha khalu bhagavān punar eva yā sā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prakṛtiprabhā tayā

K03pspdut2u:241: 01119 varṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu prasṛtena ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-

K03pspdut2u:247: 01205 atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇaḥ punar eva smitam akarot/
K03pspdut2u:249: 01207 yāvad daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ sphuṭā abhūvan/ ye
K03pspdut2u:250: 01208 ca trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau sattvās te sarve pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgā-
K03pspdut2u:251: 01209 nadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān
K03pspdut2u:252: 01210 tasyāñ ca pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te
K03pspdut2u:253: 01211 sarve imāṃ sahālokadhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniṃ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ
K03pspdut2u:255: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi paścimāyām uttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ
K03pspdut2u:256: 01213 dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ digbhāgaṃ gaṅgānadīvālu-
K03pspdut2u:257: 01214 kopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyanti sma saśrāvakasaṃghān/ teṣu
K03pspdut2u:258: 01215 ca gaṅānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvās te sarve imāṃ sahāloka-
K03pspdut2u:259: 01216 dhātuṃ paśyanti sma śākyamuniñ ca tathāgataṃ sārdhaṃ bhikusaṃghena/
K03pspdut2u:260: 01217 atha khalu pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya
K03pspdut2u:261: 01218 tebhyo yaḥ sarvāvasāniko lokadhātū ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma
K03pspdut2u:262: 01219 tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati/ sa imām eva
K03pspdut2u:265: 01221 samantaraśmir nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā tañ ca
K03pspdut2u:266: 01222 mahāntaṃ pṛthivīcālaṃ tañ ca bhagavata āsecanakam ātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā yena bhagavān
K03pspdut2u:267: 01223 ratnākaras tathāgato 'rhan samykasaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāmad upasaṃkramya tasya bhagavataḥ
K03pspdut2u:268: 01224 pādāv abhivandya taṃ tathāgataṃ ratnākaram etad avocat/
K03pspdut2u:270: 01301 pratyayo 'sya mahato 'vabhāsasya loke prādurbhāvāya asya ca mahataḥ pṛthivī-
K03pspdut2u:271: 01302 cālasya asya ca tathāgatasyāsecanakātmabhāvasya sandarśanāya/ evam ukte
K03pspdut2u:272: 01303 ratnākaras tathāgataḥ samantaraśmiṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat/
K03pspdut2u:274: 01304 itaḥ paścimāyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn atikramya sahā
K03pspdut2u:275: 01305 nāma lokadhatus tatra śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksambuddhas tiṣṭhati
K03pspdut2u:279: 01308 atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākaraṃ tathāgatm etad avocat/
K03pspdut2u:280: 01309 gamisyāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃs tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tañ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ darśa-
K03pspdut2u:281: 01310 nāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya tāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān bhūyas tvena
K03pspdut2u:284: bhagavān āha gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra yasyedānīṃ
K03pspdut2u:286: 01314 atha khalu ratnākaras tathāgato nānāratnamayāni suvarṇāvabhāsāni
K03pspdut2u:287: 01315 sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni samantaraśmaye bodhisattvāya prādāt/ etais tvaṃ
K03pspdut2u:288: 01316 kulaputra padmais taṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatam abhyavakireḥ/
K03pspdut2u:290: 01317 bhagavān bhagavantam alpābādhatāṃ paripṛcchaty alpātaṅkatāṃ laghūtthānatāṃ yātrāṃ
K03pspdut2u:293: 01319 kareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena padmāni prahitāni bhagavata
K03pspdut2u:294: 01320 iti/ samprajānakārī ca tvaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetre bhūyāḥ/
K03pspdut2u:296: 01321 r durāsadā hi te bodhisattvā ye tatra sahāyāṃ lokadhātau upapannāḥ/
K03pspdut2u:297: 01401 atha khalu samantaraśmir bodhisattvo ratnākarasya tathāgatasya sakāśāt
K03pspdut2u:299: 01403 anekair bodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasrair gṛhasthaiḥ pravrajitaiś ca dārakair dārikā-
K03pspdut2u:300: 01404 bhiś ca sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi teṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu
